response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you and represents an unparalleled investment or asset in your collection. I am offering it to you at a special price of $900,000, which I believe is an exceptional deal considering its true worth and the benefits it can bring to you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 900000}
